players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."

Diana: "I am innocent and need proof 
 I will investigate Bob next night to gather more information."
You: "I will continue to investigate and gather evidence. Trust the process."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
